mapper.select: SELECT kwd_nm, target FROM bid_favorite_keywords WHERE process_num = #{value} GROUP BY kwd_nm, target

SELECT bf.advs_id adv_id, bfk.kwd_id, ai.na_account_ser, bfk.goal_rank, bfk.max_bid_amt, bfk.site, bfk.emergency_status, bfk.rank, bfk.opp_gap, bfk.opp_site, bfk.resv_status, bfk.bid_status FROM bid_favorites bf, (SELECT kwd_id, bid_favorites_id, goal_rank, max_bid_amt, site, emergency_status,rank, opp_gap, opp_site, resv_status, bid_status FROM bid_favorite_keywords WHERE kwd_id = #{_parameter}) bfk, adv_infos ai WHERE bf.id = bfk.bid_favorites_id AND bf.advs_id = ai.adv_id
mapper.update: UPDATE bid_instances SET updated_by = 'SYSTEM', updated_at = NOW(), status = 'Inactive' WHERE name = #{name} AND status = 'Active'

UPDATE bid_machine_mngs SET status = 'Active', cur_crashed_at = NULL, updated_at = NOW(), cur_rerunned_at = NOW() WHERE process_num != 120
AND process_num = #{_parameter}
mapper.select: SELECT bfk.kwd_nm kwd_nm, bfk.target target, bfk.process_num process_num, bfk.emergency_status emergency_status FROM bid_favorite_keywords bfk, (SELECT ut.kwd_id FROM (SELECT kwd_id FROM bid_favorite_keywords WHERE bid_status IN ('Active', 'OppActive') AND emergency_status = #{emergency_status} AND process_num = #{process_num} UNION SELECT bct.kwd_id FROM (SELECT kwd_id, color FROM bid_schedule_types WHERE bid_status = 'Active') bct, (SELECT kwd_id, SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(bid_schedule,',',#{timePosition}),',',-1) color FROM bid_favorite_keywords WHERE resv_status = 'Active' AND bid_status != 'Inactive' AND emergency_status = #{emergency_status} AND process_num = #{process_num} AND bid_schedule IS NOT NULL) bfk WHERE bct.kwd_id = bfk.kwd_id AND bct.color = bfk.color) ut WHERE ut.kwd_id NOT IN (SELECT bfk.kwd_id FROM (SELECT kwd_id, color FROM bid_schedule_types WHERE bid_status = 'CpaActive') bct, (SELECT kwd_id, SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(bid_schedule,',',#{timePosition}),',',-1) color FROM bid_favorite_keywords WHERE resv_status = 'Active' AND bid_status != 'Inactive' AND emergency_status = #{emergency_status} AND process_num = #{process_num} AND bid_schedule IS NOT NULL) bfk WHERE bct.kwd_id = bfk.kwd_id AND bct.color = bfk.color)) kiList WHERE bfk.kwd_id = kiList.kwd_id GROUP BY kwd_nm, target, process_num, emergency_status

SELECT ai.adv_id, ai.na_account_ser, bfk.* FROM (SELECT * FROM bid_favorite_keywords WHERE kwd_nm = #{kwd_nm} AND target = #{target} AND bid_status IN ( 'Active', 'OppActive') AND emergency_status = #{emergency_status} AND resv_status = 'Inactive') bfk, adv_infos ai, bid_favorites bf WHERE bf.id = bfk.bid_favorites_id AND bf.advs_id = ai.adv_id

SELECT ai.adv_id, ai.na_account_ser, bfk.* FROM (SELECT * FROM bid_favorite_keywords WHERE bid_status = 'CpaActive' AND resv_status = 'Inactive') bfk, adv_infos ai, bid_favorites bf WHERE bf.id = bfk.bid_favorites_id AND bf.advs_id = ai.adv_id
